official_title: An Open-Label Clinical Trial Evaluating the Immunogenicity of the 9vHPV Vaccination Regimen Over 6 Months Among Women Aged 16 to 45 Years Old, An Exploratory Immunogenicity Study
inclusion_criteria:
* Women receiving care at Boston Medical Center
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 16 Years
Must have maximum age of 45 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Currently pregnant
* Prior HPV vaccination
* A history of severe allergic reaction, including known allergy to any vaccine component, specially severe allergic to yeast
* Immunocompromised/previous immunosuppressive therapy
* Thrombocytopenia or other coagulation disorder
* Currently breastfeeding
